overviews.title: Bootcamp Overview
description: A group of warriors has come up with an 8 weeks code exploration hackathon in order to build different types of decoupled applications backed by   WordPress and Drupal as backend data endpoints.
Team has built 8 containerized front end apps by integrating a few hosted WP and DP  from pantheon platform. These apps have been deployed on GCP cloud run platform.
These 8 containerized apps have been built and deployed on cloud run by using CircleCI.
